de.polygonal.ds.mem.ByteMemory

type
class
extends
MemoryAccess

A byte array using fast "alchemy-memory" for data storage.

Static Methods

ofArray(input : Array<Int>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : ByteMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a ByteMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofByteArray(input : haxe.io.BytesData, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : ByteMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a ByteMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

ofVector(input : flash.Vector<Int>, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : ByteMemory

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a ByteMemory object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toArray(input : ByteMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : Array<Int>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to an array.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

toByteArray(input : ByteMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : haxe.io.BytesData

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a byte array.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.
The bytes are written in little endian format.

toVector(input : ByteMemory, ?min : Int, ?max : Int) : flash.Vector<Int>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid range, invalid input or memory deallocated (debug only).
Converts input in the range [min, max] to a Vector object.
If no range is specified, all input bytes are copied.

Constructor

new(size : Int)

Creates a byte array capable of storing a total of size bytes.

key : Int

inherited from
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
A unique identifier for this object.
A hash table transforms this key into an index of an array element by using a hash function.
This value should never be changed by the user.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

clear() : Void

inherited from
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Sets all bytes to 0.

clone() : ByteMemory

Creates a deep copy of this object.

fill(x : Int) : Void

Sets all bytes to the value x.

free() : Void

inherited from
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Destroys this object by explicitly nullifying all pointers and instantly releases any memory that was allocated by this accessor.
Invoke this method when the life cycle of this object ends to prevent a memory leak.
This is not optional if MemoryManager.AUTO_RECLAIM_MEMORY is true.

inline get(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError segmentation Fault (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the byte at index i.

inline getAddr(i : Int) : Int

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError segmentation fault (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory deallocated (debug only).
Returns the memory byte offset for the byte at index i.

resize(newSize : Int) : Void

overrides
de.polygonal.ds.mem.MemoryAccess
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError invalid size (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory was already deallocated (debug only).
Adjusts the size of this object so it's capable of storing newSize bytes.

inline set(i : Int, x : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError segmentation Fault (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory deallocated (debug only).
Replaces the byte at the index i with the byte x.

inline swp(i : Int, j : Int) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError i equals j (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError segmentation Fault (debug only).
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError memory deallocated (debug only).
Swaps the byte at the index i with the byte at the index j.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object.
Prints out all elements if compiled with the -debug directive.
Example:

	  var mem = new new de.polygonal.ds.mem.ByteMemory(4);
	  for (i in 0...4) {
	      mem.set(i, i);
	  }
	  trace(mem);
	  {ByteMemory, size: 4}
	  |<
	    0 -> 0
	    1 -> 1
	    2 -> 2
	    3 -> 3
	  >|
